attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
All across the country Home Care is being privatised leading to poor quality of care for the most vulnerable of our society.
Local authorities need more funding to keep this service in-house with better trained and qualified staff

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "SAVE IN-HOUSE HOME CARE"

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15737.asp

Prime Minister's Office
